articles.content: WhatsApp has alleged in new court filings that an Israeli spyware company used US-based servers and was deeply involved in carrying out mobile phone hacks of 1,400 WhatsApp users, including senior government officials, journalists, and human rights activists.… [+4467 chars]

articles.description: SONY is back with its all-new Xperia L4 launching this week. Here's all you need to know about this budget device including full specs and price.
